front.title: Houjix & Out Of Nowhere
front.gametext: USED: If opponent just initiated a battle at a system or sector where you have a starship with maneuver > 3, use 1 Force to add one battle destiny.  LOST: If you just forfeited all your cards that participated in a battle you lost, cancel all remaining battle damage. (Immune to Sense.)

counterpart: Ghhhk & Those Rebels Won't Escape Us
